args.query: If z in C and |z| < 1 then |log(1 - z)| ≤ |z|/(1 - |z|)

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem norm_log_one_sub_le {z : ℂ} (hz : ‖z‖ < 1) : ‖Complex.log (1 - z)‖ ≤ ‖z‖ / (1 - ‖z‖) := by sorry
